analysis: The documents primarily concern adjustments to the pay scales and allowances for various categories of federal employees, including those in the General Schedule, Foreign Service, Veterans Health Administration, Senior Executive Service, uniformed services, and members of the Executive, Legislative, and Judicial branches. Some documents also address locality-based comparability payments and administrative law judges. The adjustments are often mandated by specific laws and are implemented through schedules attached to the orders. Some orders also address retroactive payments and conversion rules.
title: Federal Employee Compensation Adjustments
